column4: hello,, it's me again. Now, I've got another problem. I'm using Mint 64-bit, on ASUS A43E, With graphic card, detected as Intel Sandybridge Mobile and RAM 2G. Now, I've the following error (I upload in an image hosting) http://i.imgur.com/OKzOT.png Could somebody help me out? FYI, if I maximized the window, the 'error' sometimes gone. And if it still there, I just minimized/ maximized/ restore the window till it's gone.
Oh,, sorry. Thankyou for the reminder :D
